modName: Diranars Glass Armor and Weapon Recolour Mod Blue
summary: Blue Recolour of Glass Armor and Weapons, Male and Female
descriptionHtml:
Glass Armor and Weapon Recolour Mod (Replacement)
- by Diranar -

- All Weapons
- All Armor Parts Male and Female 


			Available in 3 Stunning Colours :
			---------------------------------


			\"Like Saphire\"		. the Blue Package

			\"Like Bloodstone\"	. the Red Package 
	
			\"Like Obsidian\"		. the Black package



	1. What is this ?....


This Mod will Replace the Vanilla Glass Armor and Weapons Green Texture Parts to 
either a High Quality Blue, Red or Black Colour. 
Be Sure that i take my time for my mods and hope you like them as i do.

I have only used the original texture and replaced the Glass Parts only, the rest of 
the armor is as it is in Vanilla.

Texture Size is the same as Original, so no frame drops at all to be expected 
(none on my system)




	2. How to Install this


Use WinRar or any other depacker Prog to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

To those who are new to using Elder Scrolls mods:

This is a simple Replace-Mod, so all Glass Armor and Weapons in-Game will be changed 
at once and you can only us one colour at the same time.



	3. Uh really ? ... Uninstallation


-Remove the following folders:

Data\\textures\\weapons\\glass 

Data\\textures\\armor\\glass



	4. Is it Compatibel with the other stuff ?


Mod should be compatible with every other mod, except Glass Armor or 
Weapon Texture Replacer Mods.



	5. What do i need to get this to work ?


The Game itself would be fine..



	5. History or some...


V 1.0 in three astounding colours



	6.What is ther else to tell them people ?


Thanks to Bethesda - for this great Elderscrolls Game (again :] )




	7. If you want to use this in your own mod ..


Just write me a line on Skyrim-Nexus, and there should be no problem.
author: Diranar
